scripts.start: npm run build -- -w | node node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon src/index.js --ignore test/
scripts.cover: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/**/*.test.js test/*.test.js
scripts.vs:buildAndTest: npm run build && npm run vs:test
scripts.vs:test: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report cobertura --report lcov test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js -- --timeout 5000 --exit --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test/test-results.xml
scripts.watch: npm run build -- -w | node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --timeout 5000 --exit --reporter min -w test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js
